Pre-Game Insights: Twenty-two-year-old Rhett Lowder will make his fourth start for Cincinnati.
His first three starts have been outstanding. He’s given up one run over 15 ¹/₃ innings.
The eight walks are the only concern.
Twenty-four-year-old David Festa will make his 11th start for the Minnesota Twins.
Festa has mixed reviews through the first 10 games; he was pulled after four frames when the Twins scored four times.
He has now lost four in a row.
